Name: BACCHANALIA
About the game: Your mother fell into sudden illness after your college graduation. Although the operation went very well, you still need much more money for postoperative recovery. At the suggestion of your best friend, you asked help from your mother’s friend and stepped into entertainment industry to earn money as an extra. However, troubles keep messing up with your life. At this hopeless moment, a mysterious stone gate appears in front of you... Multiple Storyline Countless choices and chances, find you Mr.Right. But be careful of every step, don’t be dragged into the swamp of desire. All Conversation Dubbed Feel the gentleness and love behind every line. Immersive Experience Your Mr.Right is waiting for you in this love drama. Fantasy Power The altar with vines, is whispering the secret of the hidden power.
